snippet: Ten months after resolving a corporate feud, Time Warner Cable has signed a contract to be a long-term sponsor of Madison Square Garden.
lead_paragraph: Ten months after resolving a corporate feud, Time Warner Cable has signed a contract to be a long-term sponsor of Madison Square Garden.

headline.seo: Time Warner Cable and Madison Square Garden in Sponsorship Deal
headline.main: Time Warner and Garden Put Past Behind With Sponsorship Deal
headline.print_headline: Time Warner and Garden Put Past Behind With Sponsorship Deal
